work_remote.title: Want to work remote?
work_remote.text: The number of remote workers in the next five years is expected to be nearly double what it was before COVID-19: By 2025, 36.2 million Americans will be remote, an increase of 16.8 million people from pre-pandemic rates.

full_control.title: You're in full control
full_control.text: Receive interview requests directly from companies that fit your needs. We’ll be sure to block your profile from current and requested employers.

list.question: Why choose TalentZoom?
list.answer: At TalentZoom, we aim to match you with the role that is the best fit for you. We make job searching both automated and highly personalized, providing you with the easiest way to discover opportunities that fit your needs. No more applications, cover letters, or recruiters – simply sign up and let interested companies request to interview you!

list.question: How can I join TalentZoom?
list.answer: Create your profile here! We assess all candidates for factors like compensation expectations, location preferences, tech stack, and years of experience to ensure we match you with your ideal position.

list.question: What kinds of opportunities can I match with?
list.answer: TalentZoom’s employers are seeking candidates for a variety of position types, including contract, full time, and remote.

list.question: Will I be guaranteed a match?
list.answer: You are not guaranteed to get matched with an employer through TalentZoom. You will only be notified with an opportunity when we have matched your skills and experience with an employer’s position criteria.

list.question: What kinds of Employers are on TalentZoom's employment marketplace?
list.answer: TalentZoom’s employer screening process means you match only with companies who are actively looking to hire for current open positions.

list.question: Can I choose who I interview with?
list.answer: Yes! You are free to accept or decline any interview request you receive from a potential employer.

list.question: How much does it cost?
list.answer: Nothing at all. TalentZoom is free for job seekers!

list.question: Can I block my current or past employers from viewing my profile?
list.answer: Yes. As a part of your profile creation process, you will be able to indicate which companies you would like blocked from your profile.

list.question: Can I see the employers on the TalentZoom marketplace and contact them directly?
list.answer: No, your profile is visible to employers and they can request an interview through the integrated TalentZoom platform.

list.question: How are the interviews structured?
list.answer: This depends on the position you are interviewing for and the employer themselves. Our Talent Advocates can help prep you for your interviews and answer any questions you may have about the process!

list.question: How long will it take for me to get hired?
list.answer: This can vary depending on the number of interview requests you accept, as well as the employer’s internal processes.

list.question: What resources and support does TalentZoom provide Job seekers?
list.answer: Each Job seeker is assigned a Talent Advocate who is there to offer guidance and answer any questions you may have throughout the hiring process.

second_card.title: Hiring a full time employee
items: Our fee is based off of new hires annual base salary

third_card.title: Hiring a contractor

transparency.title: Our investment in your people
transparency.text: Like you, we believe a company's biggest asset is their people. That's why we created an exclusive Tech Talent Community that provides ongoing support to our hired candidates.

looking_ahead.title: Looking ahead to a diverse and inclusive future
looking_ahead.text: Partnering with us means partnering with organizations that support our values and dedication to creating equal opportunity for everyone.

list.question: Why choose TalentZoom?
list.answer: Expanding your business starts with hiring top talent. TalentZoom provides employers with a better, faster, and more cost efficient way to grow your tech team. Our tech employment marketplace matches companies with pre-screened, fully-vetted tech talent using AI and high-value human touch points. Hire with better accuracy and less risk compared with traditional staffing agencies.

list.question: How much does TalentZoom cost?
list.answer:
Unlike subscription-based models, TalentZoom offers two lower-risk pricing models:
  • For Direct Placement: TalentZoom charges a fee of 8-12%.
  • When hiring a contractor: TalentZoom’s platform will provide you with an hourly bill rate based on a specific desired salary range. This rate will be set for the length of the contract and invoiced on a monthly basis.

list.question: How can I get started with TalentZoom?
list.answer:
Create a profile here. Employers are asked to provide details including:
  • Open positions for fulfillment
  • Employment type and compensation details
  • Tech stack and years of experience

list.question: What kind of Job seeker can I match with through TalentZoom?
list.answer: TalentZoom’s employment marketplace connects companies with ready-to-hire tech talent who have been pre-screened and fully-vetted by our Talent Advocates. Match with a variety of Job seekers looking for tech positions!

list.question: How do you pre-screen Job seekers?
list.answer: Our Talent Advocates screen each job seeker for skills required for the exact role they are matched with, to ensure their experience is relevant to the opportunity. Screening may also involve a managerial reference from the candidate.

list.question: How long until I receive a match with a qualified Job seeker?
list.answer: Gaining access to a large and diverse candidate pool through TalentZoom’s employment marketplace means increasing your chances of getting matched quickly and accurately with Job seekers that fit your needs. Providing the most up-to-date and detailed information in your employer profile is the best way to increase matching time. You’ll receive real-time alerts when you’ve received a match!

list.question: Can I contact Job seekers outside of the TalentZoom platform?
list.answer: TalentZoom’s platform offers integrated communications features, so all contact between employers and Job seekers occurs within the platform. Schedule interviews and send offers directly to candidates you’re interested in. Your dedicated Hiring Success Manager is there to answer any further questions you may have!

list.question: Is there anyone I can turn to for support throughout the hiring process?
list.answer: A dedicated Hiring Success Manager is assigned to each TalentZoom employer for support in all stages of the hiring process. Your Hiring Success Manager is there to answer any questions you may have, offer guidance, and ensure you successfully fulfill your open roles with talent that is the best fit for your team.

list.question: What are the hiring options?
list.answer: TalentZoom offers support in hiring for contract and full-time employment opportunities. Contractors are hired as W-2 employees, with benefits!

list.question: How often will an Employer have to communicate with TalentZoom?
list.answer: TalentZoom personalizes the hiring process by offering support and communication when your hiring team sees fit. We simplify the hiring process by alerting you with ready-to-hire candidates that you have matched with, so you only need to reach out to us with additional questions you may have.

list.question: What if I need to hire for more roles over time?
list.answer: Update your employer profile at any time with your new open positions – our team gets alerted and the matching process begins right away.

leadspace.subtitle: TalentZoom is an employment marketplace that matches Job seekers with top employers using AI matching and human touch points.

values.title: Our values
values.text: At TalentZoom, we believe in accessibility. We strive to create a world where Job seekers can discover their dream opportunity with full transparency, and where employers can hire new team members with confidence.

robust_platform.title: A robust hiring platform
